Uses of Interface
com.goldeninnovations.smp.MessageProcessor

Packages that use MessageProcessor
com.goldeninnovations.smp   
com.goldeninnovations.smp.messageprocessor The messageprocessor package provides several MessageProcessor implementations that can be used in addition to or as an alternative to defining a custom MessageProcessor implementation. 
 

Uses of MessageProcessor in com.goldeninnovations.smp
 

Methods in com.goldeninnovations.smp that return MessageProcessor
 MessageProcessor SMPServer.getMessageProcessor()
           
 

Methods in com.goldeninnovations.smp with parameters of type MessageProcessor

Uses of MessageProcessor in com.goldeninnovations.smp.messageprocessor
 

Classes in com.goldeninnovations.smp.messageprocessor that implement MessageProcessor
 class ConsoleMessageProcessor
          Writes all incoming emails to the console via System.out.
 class FileMessageProcessor
          Writes all incoming messages to a text file in the specified directory.
 class MessageProcessorChain
          Allows multiple MessageProcessors to be chained together.
 class MultiThreadedMessageProcessor
          Creates a new thread to handle each new message.
 class NoOpMessageProcessor
          Ignores all messages.
 class Slf4jMessageProcessor
          Writes all incoming emails to the slf4j logger named: com.goldeninnovations.smp.messages at level INFO.
 

Methods in com.goldeninnovations.smp.messageprocessor with parameters of type MessageProcessor
 void MessageProcessorChain.addMessageProcessor(MessageProcessor processor)
          Adds a new MessageFilter to the chain.
 

Constructors in com.goldeninnovations.smp.messageprocessor with parameters of type MessageProcessor
MultiThreadedMessageProcessor(MessageProcessor processor)
          Creates a new MultiThreadedMessageProcessor that uses the specified processor to handle incoming messages on a new thread.
